com.ibm.mqlight.api.network

Interface NetworkChannel


  • public interface NetworkChannel
    Represents an open network connection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close(Promise<Void> promise)
      Close the connection.
      Object getContext()
      Retrieves the value set using setContext(Object).
      void setContext(Object context)
      Allows an arbitrary object to be associated with this channel object.
      void write(ByteBuffer buffer, Promise<Boolean> promise)
      Write data to the network connection.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close(Promise<Void> promise)
        Close the connection.
        Parameters:
        promise - a promise which is to be completed when the connection is closed.

      • write

        void write(ByteBuffer buffer,
         Promise<Boolean> promise)
        Write data to the network connection.
        Parameters:
        buffer - contains the data to write.
        promise - a promise which is to be completed when the data is written.

      • setContext

        void setContext(Object context)
        Allows an arbitrary object to be associated with this channel object.
        Parameters:
        context -

      • getContext

        Object getContext()
        Retrieves the value set using setContext(Object). Returns null if no value has yet been set.
        Returns:
        the context object (if any) set using setContext(Object)
